qas.question: The Reformed Presbyterian Church in Malawi has a range of members between what amounts?

answers.text: education, health ministries as well as worship

context: The Reformed Presbyterian Church in <b6_0>Malawi<b6_0/> has <b3_0>150<b3_0/> congregations and <a0_0><b4_0>17 000–20 000<b4_0/> members<a0_0/>.
